name: lizjones
text: It's like a modern-day Trojan Horse.

name: sharkofsomerton
text: Some guy on the street asked Russel If he was Tim Simmon's brother. After a few trips and a hire P.I. Ray found this outside his door.

name: sharkofsomerton
text: A comment left by sharkofsomerton was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by 7th_shot, Ariamaki, Shinkicka)

name: lolsworth
text: Except Ray's cleverer than the entire Trojan people put together, all of whom were FUCKING MORONS.

name: geysershitdick
text: I'm just gonna come out and say it: I DON'T GET THIS STRIP

name: petitegitan
text: Me neither. I am also reluctant to admit how often I have to Google the people mentioned in Achewood strips.

name: zefiel
text: A comment left by zefiel was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Direhaggis, clintisiceman, Panserbjorne)

name: overmedicated
text: The answer lies within the blog of Phillipe. I think.

name: tekende
text: That's what I was thinking as well!

name: alejandroadam
text: the joke is if you piss off Russell Simmons he will put a crazy big nike on your doorstep. I found it incredibly funny.

name: cousinted
text: I thought the joke was how calm Ray is upon discovering a running shoe the size of a hybrid car on his doorstep.

name: soticoto
text: And here I was thinking the shoe was just on a table in the foreground and in fact of a totally usual size.... rather than being right next to Ray and abnormally oversized.

name: coridoroiy
text: Russell Simmons is a big dude, and Ray is a cat

name: maniakattak
text: Shoes aren't usually catsized. How tall is Russ, anyway?

name: jdhenry105
text: That's not a crazy big shoe for a human, mind.

name: kledermans
text: Uh, I don't know that many humans who wear shoes twice the size of an obese adult male cat.  That's still a crazy big shoe.

name: jdhenry105
text: Well played.

name: saint
text: better a shoe than a jock strap.

name: philosophe
text: The funniest part for me was that, although Ray doesn't remember the night, as soon as he sees that shoe he knows who's pissed at him. As if Russel Simmons and giant shoes on your doorstep are a Thing.

name: greenkoolayd
text: its quite easy, considering what russel simmons does for a living....

text: This was a good period.

name: littlefatdog
text: is very good joke. russell simmons is like a hip hop manager type dude with lots of dollars. it's like getting a horse head in your bed like in the Godfather or getting your car smashed up with pennies like in Weeds. is so funny.

name: electricjelly
text: does anyone know what Nike model that is, exactly?

name: ttagxamm
text: Closest match I think would be a custom Air Bruin Max ID Oregon.  [NB I am not a brand name shoe expert.  I buy $10 sneakers at a discount store, all with an upside down faux swoosh; a sneaker should not affect my credit rating.  But Nike.com has hell of shoe pictures, and I geeky for looking up stupid things.]

text: Nike Air "Cortez"

text:
Today was the first day I ever realized it did not say "Richard Simmons."

Today was not the first day I read this comic.

Far from it.

text: Is wishful-contemporarymanship a real circumstance?
